function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on data from food truck practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emphasis on resilience during environmental uncertainty","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from food truck interactions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic response leading to increased disease spread","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication and transparency about pandemic-related changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid changes in the food truck business model in response to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on food trucks and mobile vendors in the context of pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased popularity of food trucks leading to higher consumer exposure to different cuisines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant decline in sales and workforce layoffs in the restaurant and food services industry due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased uncertainty and risks associated with dining out due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposing consumers to covid-19 through dining out","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ability and willingness of consumers to continue social dining experiences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration with local communities may lead to increased risk of contagious disease propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspected ’greenwashing’ in ecotourism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in product and service production","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unbalanced relationship between human and nature","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the local communities and project construction site due to increased interaction and proximity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with the transmission of zoonotic diseases from amazonian animals to humans, especially in the context of wildlife rehabilitation and conservation programs.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate sanitation and waste management practices leading to the contamination of water sources and the spread of waterborne diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly controlled tourism development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respect for local traditions and landscape","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourist activity in local communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management leading to environmental contamination and health hazards","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of income and control leading to development of illegal activities in the territory","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recruitment of international staff may increase the risk of introducing contagious diseases from abroad.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorporating students and graduates as trainees and staff may introduce contagious diseases to the lodge.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to retain and train qualified staff for managerial positions may lead to higher turnover and increase the risk of disease transmission due to frequent staff changes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaboration with outsiders may introduce new contagious diseases to the local community or staff members.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High level of staff and management rotation may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases among different groups of employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of contagious diseases spreading within the local indigenous communities due to increased contact with external populations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The high level of uncertainty and unreliability in the availability of unskilled work within the communities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social activities such as mingas can lead to postponement of work and affect the rhythm of community life","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain long-term toll of coronavirus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on workforce and economy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural differences in work environment expectations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interactions between children aged 5 to 18 and the local population can lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in hr organization in the \n’new normal’ can lead to challenges in implementing health and safety protocols for employees and visitors.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exchange of ideas and practices between locals and foreign visitors could introduce new pathogens to the community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ecotourism bringing people from different parts of the world to indigenous communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and connection to nature leading to unsustainable lifestyle.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of local cultures and traditions in the pursuit of tourism experiences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to engage tourists in conservation efforts and environmental awareness.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on potential over credentials in hiring process could lead to increased risk of contagious diseases in the workplace if health status is not properly assessed.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emphasis on sustainable development and conservation in partnerships may lead to increased risk of exposure to zoonotic diseases or environmental hazards.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for human health and well-being in favor of economic recovery may lead to increased risk of public health crises, including contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on community thinking may not always be practical or efficient in solving problems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality in modern society due to emphasis on individualism over community spirit.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on communal support for renovation work may pose health risks during contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of program focused on traditional medicines with local shaman","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Waste management program generating revenues from plastic waste","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
